name: Torture and Care your Zombie
description:
If you're tired of taking care of virtual pets dogs, cats or poop with eyes, now as a world first in this store, you'll have your own pet zombie.
It is the ideal virtual pet as it never dies.
You can feed, kill and revive whenever you want. Your zombie is quite polite, but just in case, also provided tools for control which are:

• American M4A1 assault rifle.
• Russian AK74 assault rifle.
• Flamethrower
• Stack high voltage, to revive and educate your pet.

If you believe that your zombie is ugly, you have a store of accessories to tune it. You can put glasses and so cover her 'lazy eye', hats to cover the brain, along with a dagger or clown nose to party.
To get points, play minigame killing skulls raised in your path. Points earned can be exchanged for the accessories in the store.

You can also earn px points watching the ads videos.

Soon more accessories and games.
